mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu SET cafeId = #{cafeId}, menuName = #{menuName}, price = #{price}, comment = #{comment}, menuPic = #{menuPic}
mapper.select: SELECT a.menuName,a.price,a.comment,a.menuPic,b.optionName,b.addPrice,b.required FROM menu a LEFT JOIN menu_option b on a.menuId=b.menuId WHERE a.menuId=#{menuId}
